alert.note: Alert for Butler; Grayson; Ohio (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 11:13AM EDT until June 29 at 11:45AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Butler County in south central Kentucky... Western Grayson County in central Kentucky... Ohio County in central Kentucky... * Until 1045 AM CDT. * At 1011 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hartford, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hartford, Morgantown, Casey, Lee, Beaver Dam, Caneyville, Centertown, Mchenry, Rockport and Rochester. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
